mapper.select: SELECT o.order_id,o.actual_pay, o.total_pay,o.create_time, os.status, od.sku_id, od.title ,od.image, od.num , od.own_spec, od.price FROM tb_order o LEFT JOIN tb_order_status os ON os.order_id = o.order_id LEFT JOIN tb_order_detail od ON od.order_id = o.order_id WHERE os.status IN (2,3,4,6) ORDER BY o.create_time DESC
